hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer ¬∑ AI Enthusiast
hero.bio: Computer Science student, I combine web development and a passion for artificial intelligence. Self-driven and curious, I build projects that push my technical limits.

about.title: About
about.bio_p1: Currently in my third year of a Computer Science degree at IUT de Reims, I have built a strong technical foundation in web development. But beyond coursework, I am a passionate maker who needs to
about.bio_p1_end: . Self-taught, I deploy my own servers, explore local AI models with Ollama, and closely follow financial markets.
about.bio_p2_start: I am currently looking for a
about.bio_p2_strong: work-study position in software development and AI
about.bio_p2_end: to join an engineering school and transition from technician to engineer.

passions.label: Artificial Intelligence
passions.desc: Keeping up with generative AI, local models with Ollama

items.title: Treasurely

experience.title: Journey
experience.autodidact_desc: All these experiences were completely self-taught.

autodidact_projects.desc: Server deployment to run OpenClaw, a self-hosted open-source AI assistant.
